title: Snapchat influencer launches an AI-powered 'virtual girlfriend' to help 'cure loneliness'
description: Snapchat influencer Caryn Marjorie launched an AI-powered 'virtual girlfriend' called CarynAI to help 'cure loneliness'

title: FDA approves drug to treat hot flashes and night sweats
description: The FDA approved on Friday a new nonhormonal medication to treat hot flashes and night sweats caused by menopause.

title: NFL’s Washington Commanders to be bought from Dan Snyder by group including 76ers co-owner and Magic Johnson
description: A group led by billionaire investor Josh Harris has agreed to buy the NFL’s Washington Commanders from longtime owner Dan Snyder and his family.

title: Driver accused of being 3 times over legal limit arrested after fatal crash told police she 'did nothing wrong'
description: The suspected drunk driver accused of killing a bride on her wedding day in South Carolina told police she "did nothing wrong" despite allegedly having a blood alcohol content more than three times the legal limit, according to official documents.

title: Verdict reached in case of Lori Vallow, Idaho mom accused of killing 2 of her kids
description: The jury has reached a verdict in the murder trial of Idaho mother Lori Vallow, who is accused of killing two of her kids and conspiring to kill her husband’s ex-wife.

title: Biden and McCarthy spoke by phone ahead of debt ceiling meeting
description: House Speaker Kevin McCarthy, R-Calif., spoke by phone with President Joe Biden on Sunday night ahead of the debt limit negotiations this past Tuesday.

title: El Paso residents are split on migration in and around their border city
description: In El Paso, Texas, residents have different views about the large numbers of migrants arriving at their border city.

title: Asian Americans are no longer pop culture side-kicks — they're defining the mainstream
description: Netflix’s “Beef” dives deep into the psyches of two people who happen to be Asian American as they’re entangled in a universal experience — road rage.

title: No big increase at border right after Title 42 ended, DHS official says
description: Live updates: Water to be released into Rio Grande, raising safety concerns for migrants

title: NYC subway rider who put Jordan Neely in fatal chokehold surrenders to police
description: The Marine veteran who was seen in a video putting Jordan Neely in a fatal chokehold on a New York City subway surrendered to the police department Friday to face criminal charges.

title: Russia denies any Ukrainian breakthrough after Bakhmut gains spark panic
description: Russia has pushed back at suggestions of a broader Ukrainian breakthrough on the eastern front lines of the war after gains around Bakhmut sparked panic about a long-awaited counteroffensive.

title: NBCUniversal ad chief leaves as Twitter speculation swirls
description: NBCUniversal said Friday that Linda Yaccarino, its chairman of global advertising and partnerships, is leaving the company amid reports from The New York Times and The Wall Street Journal that she is in talks to become CEO of Twitter.

title: Congress leaves town with no debt ceiling deal, but some see signs of progress
description: Congressional leaders and President Joe Biden postponed a planned meeting on the debt ceiling this week, but there are small signs of progress toward a deal.

title: National Maternal Mental Health Hotline received over 12,000 calls and texts in its first year
description: A mental health hotline for new and expectant parents received a surge in calls and texts after Massachusetts mother Lindsay Clancy allegedly killed her kids.

title: Migrants wait for chance to enter U.S. after end of pandemic-era restrictions
description: At El Paso's Gate 42 in the minutes and hours after the lifting of Title 42, the processing of people from the Mexican side of the border appeared orderly.

title: Google unveils latest AI features
description: Google unveiled new AI tools for some of the tech giant's notable applications such as upgrades to Google Maps and introduced "Universal Translator" which redubs video in a new language while matching the speaker's lips with the words.

title: Criminal investigation into Sen. Bob Menendez expands with new subpoenas
description: Another round of federal grand jury subpoenas went out this week in connection with the corruption investigation into Democratic Sen. Bob Menendez of New Jersey.

title: YouTuber who crashed plane in California mountains did it for sponsorship deal, authorities say
description: A YouTuber whose single-engine airplane crashed in a California national forest admitted that he downed the aircraft to boost views for a sponsorship deal, authorities said Thursday.
